workflow_analysis: The workflow is about searching for cat videos on Google and navigating through the interface to access short video content. The recording involves navigating to Google's homepage, inputting 'cat', selecting a suggested search entry, pressing 'Enter' to execute the search, then clicking on the 'Short videos' option. The goal of this workflow is to efficiently automate the process of finding and accessing cat-related video content in a dynamic browsing context.
name: GoogleCatVideoSearch
description: This workflow automates searching for cat videos on Google and navigating to short videos.

steps.description: Click on the 'Short videos' tab to view short cat videos.
